It's Nice To Meet You
Tell Me More

Services

Music Production, Graphic Design, Video Production, Web Development and Mobile Development.

Intrumental Beats

We've set the trend in Vanuatu music production. Once you buy beats or try our instrumentals, you'll never go anywhere else.

Mixing and Mastering

We deliver insane industry quality Mixing and Mastering, 24/7 customer service and the easiest and fastest experience around for the absolute LOWEST pricing guarenteed!

Graphic Design

With years of experience working with large corporate clients as well as small local businesses we can help you deliver your message in style. All at a budget that won't break the bank.

Video Production

From concept to conclusion, we produce highly creative, fresh and innovative high definition broadcast quality films for TV, DVD and the Web

Website Development

Beautiful, fast, clean website design. Everything we design is built from scratch, personalised for you. No templates. From a single page web presence through to e-commerce and database driven sites, we'll get the job done on time.

Mobile Development

Take your small business or brand to new heights! Reach new clients and boost your bottom line by integrating e-commerce, coupons, your product catalog, audio content, events, photos, videos, and more.

About

Independent Record Label based at Fres Wota 4, Efate, Vanuatu

  • 2011

    Our Humble Beginnings

    We initially started out as a mobile recording studio to record upcoming Ni-Van artists.

  • April 2012

    Pilo Wan Plus Four

    Our first project was "Pilo Wan Plus Four - Nasama Resort" and since then we have made it our mission to help struggling artists.

  • April 2013

    Manples Warriors

    We launched this project back in 2012, to help youth at Manples Area through music. Around April of 2013 the boys came together and formed Manples Warriors Band.

  • December 2013

    Independent Record Label

    When asked, what is the biggest obstacle in our music industry? The answer is not enough exposure on the International Market. So we move into publishing to kick start promotion of Vanuatu Artists and Producers.

  • July 2014

    Paxton Beatz Compilations Vol:1

    Paxton Beatz is a young talented producer and beat maker. He is also one of the main driving force behind Kings Tone 4 Records.

  • October 2014

    Mobile App

    Now you can get the latest music from Vanuatu on your mobile device. Support for both iOS and Android devices.

  • November 2014

    Website Redesign

    Beautiful, fast, clean website design using flask micro framework and bootstrap.

  • Be Part
    Of Our
    Story!

Our Amazing Team

We do our best work in our free time

Stanley Wai

Tech Suport / Graphics Designer

Paxton Beats

Producer / Beat maker

Be part of our team!

kt4records@gmail.com

We're a small independent recording label based at Fres Wota 4, Efate, Vanuatu. And we've been colaborating with some of Vanuatu's major Music Recording Studios and Video Productions Studios (Master Sounds, Fres Wota 1 Studio, Tropicsounds, Local Remedy and Wai Films) to deliver insane industry quality video and audio.

Paxton Beatz Compilations

Paxton Beatz is a young talented producer and beat maker. He is also one of the main driving force behind Kings Tone 4 Records. He has been working with countless artist and numerous bands, just to name a few; Vanessa Quai, Naio, Aimos, Genesis, Hoobz, Zadok, Gazza, Manples Warriors, Shanty Town, Smol Fyah and many more, Want this Album? Contact Paxton Beatz on Facebook.

  • Client: Paxton Beatz
  • Date: July 2014
  • Service: Instrumental Beats
